mecard.requestbuilder

Class PAPIRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.requestbuilder.ILSRequestBuilder
      • mecard.requestbuilder.PAPIRequestBuilder

  • public class PAPIRequestBuilder
extends ILSRequestBuilder
    This class supports creating commands through Polaris API or PAPI. Polaris uses a restful web service for all ILS transactions.
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet
